comment: The video about the scientist was very interesting, though watch the Jews for Jesus movement, they emphasize these people are still Jews. To me, you believe in Christ, you're a Christian. I'm concerned they're trying to retain rogue Jews. Embrace Christianity if you believe in Christ.
